sn15.20:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
sn15.20:2.2: Pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn15.20:2.3: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘pacinavamso’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:2.4: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussanam ‘tivara’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:2.5: Tivaranam, bhikkhave, manussanam cattarisa vassasahassani ayuppamanam ahosi.
sn15.20:2.6: Tivara, bhikkhave, manussa pacinavamsam pabbatam catuhena arohanti, catuhena orohanti.
sn15.20:2.7: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kakusandho bhagava araham sammasambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
sn15.20:2.8: Kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa vidhurasanjivam nama savakayugam ahosi aggam bhaddayugam.
sn15.20:2.9: Passatha, bhikkhave, sa cevimassa pabbatassa samanna antarahita, te ca manussa kalankata, so ca bhagava parinibbuto.
sn15.20:2.13: Yavancidam, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasankharesu nibbinditum, alam virajjitum, alam vimuccitum.
sn15.20:3.1: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘vankako’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:3.2: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussanam ‘rohitassa’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:3.3: Rohitassanam, bhikkhave, manussanam timsavassasahassani ayuppamanam ahosi.
sn15.20:3.4: Rohitassa, bhikkhave, manussa vankakam pabbatam tihena arohanti, tihena orohanti.
sn15.20:3.5: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena konagamano bhagava araham sammasambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
sn15.20:3.6: Konagamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa bhiyyosuttaram nama savakayugam ahosi aggam bhaddayugam.
sn15.20:3.7: Passatha, bhikkhave, sa cevimassa pabbatassa samanna antarahita, te ca manussa kalankata, so ca bhagava parinibbuto.
sn15.20:4.1: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘supasso’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:4.2: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussanam ‘suppiya’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:4.3: Suppiyanam, bhikkhave, manussanam visativassasahassani ayuppamanam ahosi.
sn15.20:4.4: Suppiya, bhikkhave, manussa supassam pabbatam dvihena arohanti, dvihena orohanti.
sn15.20:4.5: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kassapo bhagava araham sammasambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
sn15.20:4.6: Kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa tissabharadvajam nama savakayugam ahosi aggam bhaddayugam.
sn15.20:4.7: Passatha, bhikkhave, sa cevimassa pabbatassa samanna antarahita, te ca manussa kalankata, so ca bhagava parinibbuto.
sn15.20:5.1: Etarahi kho pana, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘vepullo’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:5.2: Etarahi kho pana, bhikkhave, imesam manussanam ‘magadhaka’tveva samanna udapadi.
sn15.20:5.3: Magadhakanam, bhikkhave, manussanam appakam ayuppamanam parittam lahukam;
sn15.20:5.4: yo ciram jivati so vassasatam appam va bhiyyo.
sn15.20:5.5: Magadhaka, bhikkhave, manussa vepullam pabbatam muhuttena arohanti muhuttena orohanti.
sn15.20:5.6: Etarahi kho panaham, bhikkhave, araham sammasambuddho loke uppanno.
sn15.20:5.7: Mayham kho pana, bhikkhave, sariputtamoggallanam nama savakayugam aggam bhaddayugam.
sn15.20:5.8: Bhavissati, bhikkhave, so samayo ya ayancevimassa pabbatassa samanna antaradhayissati, ime ca manussa kalam karissanti, ahanca parinibbayissami.
sn15.20:5.12: Yavancidam, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasankharesu nibbinditum, alam virajjitum, alam vimuccitun”ti.
sn15.20:6.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
